gurmukhi: qnM qRwxnI Awid kih irp Air AMq bKwn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ sujwn ]491]
transliteration: Tanan Traananiaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Sujaan||491||
translation: Saying the word “Charmani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed, which may be comprehended.491.

gurmukhi: piRQm crmxI Sbd kih irp Air AMq aucwr ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]492]
transliteration: Pritham Charmanishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||492||
translation: Saying the word “Charmani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed, which may be comprehended correctly.492.

gurmukhi: piRQm isDrxI Sbd kih irp Air aucrhu AMq ]nwm qupk jU ky skl inksq clq AnMq ]493]
transliteration: Pritham Sipranishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ouchroh Ant|| Naam Toupak Joo Ke Sakal Niksat Chalat Anant||493||
translation: Saying the word “Kshiprani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, all the names of Tupak in innumerable forms continue to be evolved.493.

gurmukhi: Sbd slxI Awid kih irp Air pd ky dIn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN suGr lIjIAhu cIn ]494]
transliteration: Shabad Salaniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Soughar Leejeeauh Cheen||494||
translation: Saying the word “Shalyani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” the names of Tupak are formed, which O talented persons ! You may recoggnise.494.

gurmukhi: piRQm c`kRxI Sbid kih irp Air pd ko dIn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ pRbIn ]495]
transliteration: Pritham Chakkranishabad(i) Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Padk Ko Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Prabeen||495||
translation: Saying the word “Chakrani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, the names of Tupak are formed, which O skilful people ! you may comprehend.495.

gurmukhi: Awid KVgnI Sbd kih irp Air AMq aucwr ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib suDwr ]496]
transliteration: Aadh Khadagnishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Ouchaar|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||496||
translation: Uttering the word “Kharagni” in the beginning and then saying “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.496.

gurmukhi: Awid KVgnI Sbd kih irp Air AMq aucwr ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ sujwn ]497]
transliteration: Asaniaadh Ouchaar Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Niksat Chalat Sujaan||497||
translation: Saying the word “Ashivni” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.497.

gurmukhi: inssqRYnI au`cwir kY irp Air AMq bKwn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN inksq clq pRmwn ]498]
transliteration: Nis-strainiouchcdaar(i) Kai Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Niksat Chalat Pramaan||498||
translation: Saying the word “Nisastraini” in the beginning and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak continue to be evolved in authenticated form.498.

gurmukhi: KgnI Awid bKwn kY irp Air pd ky dIn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ pRbIn ]499]
transliteration: Khagadiaadh Bakhaan Kai Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Prabeen||499||
translation: Saying the word “Khagni” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, the names of Tupak are formed.499.

gurmukhi: SsqReysxI Awid kih irp Air pd ky dIn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ pRbIn ]500]
transliteration: Shastraesniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Prabeen||500||
translation: Saying the word “Shastar-aishani” in the beginning and then adding “Ripu Ari”, O skilful persons ! comprehend the names of Tupak.500.

gurmukhi: SsqR rwjnI Awid kih irp Air AMq aucwr ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu su kib ibcwr ]501]
transliteration: Shastra Raavaniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Su Kabi Bichaar||501||
translation: Saying the word “Shastar-raajini” in the beginning and then uttering “Ripu Ari” at the end, the names of Tupak are formed.501.

gurmukhi: SsqR rwvnI Awid kih irp Air AMq bKwn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu cqur pRmwn ]502]
transliteration: Shastra Raavaniaadh Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Chatur Pramaan||502||
translation: Saying the word “Shastar-ravani” in the beginning and then uttering “Ripu Ari”, the names of Tupak are formed.502.

gurmukhi: Awid sYPnI Sbd kih irp Air AMq bKwn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ sujwn ]503]
transliteration: Aad Saiphanishabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Ant Bakhaan|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Sujaan||503||
translation: Saying the word “Saiphani” in the beginning and then uttering “Ripu Ari”, O wise men ! comprehend the names of Tupak.503.

gurmukhi: Awid qygnI Sbd kih irp Air pd ky dIn ]nwm qupk ky hoq hYN lIjhu smJ pRbIn ]504]
transliteration: Aad Tegadi Shabad Kah(i) Rip Ar(i) Pad Ke Deen|| Naam Toupak Ke Hot Hain Leejoh Samajh Prabeen||504||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Tegani” and then adding “Ripu Ari, the names of Tupak are formed.504.
